text: e) Brachydactyly syndrome 90% Clinodactyly of the 5th finger 90% Craniosynostosis 90% Epicanthus 90% Finger syndactyly 90% Genu valgum 90% Hypertelorism 90% Macrocephaly 90% Narrow face 90% Obesity 90% Plagiocephaly 90% Prominent metopic ridge 90% Tall stature 90% Abnormality of the metacarpal bones 50% Depressed nasal ridge 50% Strabismus 50% Cryptorchidism 7.5% Depressed nasal bridge 7.5% Hypoplasia of penis 7.5% Low-set, posteriorly rotated ears 7.5% Autosomal recessive inheritance - Oxycepha
